{{Other uses|34th Street station (disambiguation){{!}}34th Street station}} {{Use mdy dates|date=January 2017}} {{Infobox NYCS | name = 34 Street–Herald Square | type = complex | bg_color = black | image = 34th Street-Herald Square Entrance.JPG | image_caption = The station entrance as seen in 2013 (note: the '''[[W (New York City Subway service)|W]]''' train now also stops here) | accessible = yes | address = Intersection of West 34th Street, Broadway & Sixth Avenue
New York, NY 10001 | borough = [[Manhattan]] | locale = [[Herald Square]], [[Midtown Manhattan]] | coordinates = {{coord|40.749338|N|73.987985|W|display=inline,title}} | lat_dir = N | lon_dir = W | open_date = {{start date and age|1948|07|01}}[[The New York Times]], [https://www.nytimes.com/1948/06/30/archives/transfer-points-under-higher-fare-board-of-transportation-lists.html Transfer Points Under Higher Fare], June 30, 1948, page 19 | division = BMT/IND | line = [[IND Sixth Avenue Line]]
[[BMT Broadway Line]] | service = Herald Square | connection = {{bus icon}} '''[[NYCT Bus]]''': {{NYC bus link|M4|M5|M7|M34 SBS|M34A SBS|M55|Q32}}
{{bus icon}} '''[[MTA Bus]]''': {{NYC bus link|BxM2|QM1|QM2|QM3|QM4|QM5|QM6|QM10|QM11|QM12|QM15|QM16|QM17|QM18|QM20|QM24}}
{{rint|path|18px}} '''[[Port Authority Trans-Hudson|PATH]]''': [[JSQ–33]], [[HOB–33]], [[JSQ–33 (via HOB)]] (at [[33rd Street (PATH station)|33rd Street]])
[[File:BSicon BAHN.svg|12px|alt=Railway transportation]] '''[[Amtrak]]''', '''[[Long Island Rail Road|LIRR]]''', '''[[NJT Rail]]''' (at [[Pennsylvania Station (New York City)|Penn Station]]) | code = 607 | passengers = 39,672,507 (station complex){{NYCS const|riderref}} | pass_year = 2017 | pass_percent = 1.7 | rank = 3 | structure = Underground | levels = 2 | wifi = yes | wifi_custom_ref = 2 | legend = {{NYCS infobox legend|allexceptnights}}{{NYCS infobox legend|alltimes}}{{NYCS infobox legend|weekdaysonly}} }} '''34th Street–Herald Square''' is an underground [[metro station|station]] complex on the [[BMT Broadway Line]] and the [[IND Sixth Avenue Line]] of the [[New York City Subway]], and is the third-busiest station in the system with 39,672,507 passengers entering the station in 2017. It is located at [[Herald Square]] in [[Midtown Manhattan]] where [[34th Street (Manhattan)|34th Street]], [[Broadway (Manhattan)|Broadway]] and [[Sixth Avenue (Manhattan)|Sixth Avenue]] (Avenue of the Americas) intersect, and is served by the: * '''[[D (New York City Subway service)|D]]''', '''[[F (New York City Subway service)|F]]''', '''[[N (New York City Subway service)|N]]''', and '''[[Q (New York City Subway service)|Q]]''' trains at all times * '''[[R (New York City Subway service)|R]]''' train at all times except late nights * '''[[B (New York City Subway service)|B]]''', '''[[M (New York City Subway service)|M]]''', and '''[[W (New York City Subway service)|W]]''' trains on weekdays ==Station layout== {{NYCS Platform Layout 34th Street-Herald Square Station}} This station complex has a long [[mezzanine (architecture)|mezzanine]] above the platforms. Three staircases and two elevators lead to each of the two Broadway line platforms. Three pairs of escalators lead to the Sixth Avenue line platforms (two to the northbound one and one to the southbound one). There is a non-ADA-compliant ramp that leads to an intermediate level. This level has two sets of staircases leading to each of the Sixth Avenue platforms. The elevators to this level are at the north end of the mezzanine. {{Midtown Manhattan subway cross section}} ===Exits=== At the north end of this mezzanine is the 35th Street exit, which contains a bank of turnstiles, token booth, and street stairs. Three staircases lead to all corners of Sixth Avenue and 35th Street except the southwest one. There is also a short passageway to either western corner of Broadway and 35th Street.{{cite web|title=MTA Neighborhood Maps: Pennsylvania Station / Times Square|url=http://web.mta.info/maps/neighborhoods/mn/M08_PennStation_2015.pdf|website=[[Metropolitan Transportation Authority|mta.info]]|publisher=[[Metropolitan Transportation Authority]]|accessdate=December 11, 2015|date=2015}} In addition to this exit, the mezzanine has connections with the two entrances at Broadway/Sixth Avenue and 34th Street. The entrance on the west side is staffed full-time and has two staircases to 34th Street. The northwest staircase has an entrance to an underground [[Burger King]]. There is a long passageway containing a single street elevator that leads to [[Port Authority Trans-Hudson|PATH]] at [[33rd Street (PATH station)|33rd Street]]. The entrance on the east side of 34th Street is staffed part-time and when the token booth is closed, only two HEET turnstiles provide access to the mezzanine. This entrance has a passageway that connects to the 35th Street exit and has two pairs of exit-only turnstiles from the mezzanine. There is another mezzanine at the south end of the Sixth Avenue level that has two staircases leading to each platform. It is directly underneath the PATH station mezzanine (two levels from street level) and has a passageway leading to the entrance at Broadway and 32nd Street. Outside of fare control, there is an entrance leading directly to the two basement levels of [[J. C. Penney]] in the [[Manhattan Mall]]. There are also escalators that lead to the front entrance of the mall. The entrance at Broadway and 32nd Street is unstaffed, has two street stairs, and one stair to each of the two Broadway platforms on the very south end. There are street stairs to either northern corner of Broadway and 32nd Street, as well as to the northeast corner of 6th Avenue and 32nd Street ===Passageways=== [[File:Herald Sq ramp vc.jpg|220px|right|thumb|Passageways in the station for transfers between the IND and BMT platforms]] There are closed passageways (but not free transfers) to the adjacent [[42nd Street–Bryant Park (IND Sixth Avenue Line)|42nd Street–Bryant Park]] station to the north and to [[34th Street–Penn Station (IRT Broadway–Seventh Avenue Line)|34th Street–Penn Station]] on the [[IRT Broadway–Seventh Avenue Line]]. {{anchor|Gimbels passageway}}There was once an out-of-system passageway to [[Pennsylvania Station (New York City)|Pennsylvania Station]] one block west. During the 1970s and 1980s, the New York City Subway had high rates of crime, as did the rest of the city; the passageway similarly experienced high crime rates. The passageway, with only two exits–one at each end–was located under 33nd Street and was so named because it was next to the basements of the [[Gimbels]] department store and the [[Hotel Pennsylvania]]. This passageway was closed in the 1990s and passengers now must walk at street level to connect to the commuter railroads.[https://nypost.com/2010/11/28/remembering-the-gimbels-tunnel/ Remembering the Gimbels tunnel], New York Post A real estate developer, [[Vornado Realty Trust]], proposed in 2010 to reopen the passageway in exchange for variances to build office towers replacing existing structures in the area.{{cite web | url=https://nypost.com/2010/04/13/vornados-penn-tower-deal/ | title=Vornado’s Penn tower deal | publisher=New York Post | date=April 13, 2010 | accessdate=July 23, 2015 | author=Steve Cuozzo}} The pathway to [[Bryant Park]] was outside of fare control, but was intended to relieve passenger flow at the 42nd and 34th Street stations.{{cite web | url=http://www.newyorker.com/archive/1940/05/04/1940_05_04_013_TNY_CARDS_000180572 | title=Underground | publisher=New Yorker | date=May 4, 1940 | accessdate=July 23, 2015 | author=E. J. KAHN AND HAROLD ROSS}} In the 1980s, the passageway became a gathering spot for homeless people and drug users. The passageway was closed on March 23, 1991 after a rape.{{cite web | url=https://www.nytimes.com/1991/03/23/nyregion/subway-path-boarded-shut-after-a-rape.html?pagewanted=1 | title=Subway Path Boarded Shut After a Rape | publisher=The New York Times | date=March 23, 1991 | accessdate=July 23, 2015 | author=Craig Wolff}} === Renovations === On November 28, 1969, the turnstiles and exit gates at the northern end of the station were relocated, making four more staircases from the Broadway Line platforms available for transfers to the Sixth Avenue platforms. Previously, transfers could only be made from two staircases.{{Cite news|url=https://www.newspapers.com/clip/24726178/daily_news/|title=Easier Transfer at 34th & 6th|last=|first=|date=November 28, 1969|work=New York Daily News|access-date=November 5, 2018}} This complex was overhauled in the late 1970s. The Transit Authority fixed the station's structure and renovated its appearance. The overhaul replaced the original wall tiles, old signs, and incandescent lighting to the 1970s modern look wall tile band and tablet mosaics, signs and fluorescent lights. It also fixed staircases and platform edges. In the early 1990s, the station received another major repair, which included an upgrade for [[Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990|ADA-accessibility]] and modernized wall tiling. The MTA repaired the staircases, re-tiling for the walls, installed new tiling on the floors, upgraded the station's lights and the public address system, installing [[Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990|ADA]] safety threads along the platform edge, new signs, and new track-beds in both directions. {{-}} == BMT Broadway Line platforms == {{Infobox NYCS | name = 34 Street–Herald Square | font_color = black | font_color_2 = black | bg_color = #FFC800 | image = 34th Street-Herald Square.JPG | image_caption = | division = BMT | line = [[BMT Broadway Line]] | service = Broadway | platforms = 2 [[island platform]]s
[[cross-platform interchange]] | tracks = 4 | accessible = yes | open_date = {{start date and age|1918|01|05}}[[The New York Times]], [http://www.nycsubway.org/articles/nytimes-1918-broadway.html Open New Subway to Times Square], January 6, 1918 | code = 012 | wifi = yes | next_north = {{NYCS next | line=BMT Broadway Line | station=Times Square–42nd Street | service=Broadway}} | next_south = {{NYCS next | type=local | line=BMT Broadway Line | station=28th Street | service=Broadway local}}
{{NYCS next | type=express | line=BMT Broadway Line | station=14th Street–Union Square | service=Broadway express}} | next_north_acc = {{NYCS next | line=BMT Broadway Line | station=Times Square–42nd Street | service=Broadway}} | next_south_acc = {{NYCS next | line=BMT Broadway Line | station=14th Street–Union Square | service=Broadway}} | legend = {{NYCS infobox legend|allexceptnights}}{{NYCS infobox legend|alltimes}}{{NYCS infobox legend|nightsonly}}{{NYCS infobox legend|nightsweekends}}{{NYCS infobox legend|weekdaysonly}} }} {{Stack|float=right| {{Routemap |title=Track layout |title-bg=#{{NYCS color|Broadway}} |legend =track |map=numN345 uvSTR!~MFADEg\uvSTR!~MFADEg ~~ ~~ ~~ to [[Times Square–42nd Street (BMT Broadway Line)|Times Sq–42 St]] uvSTRf\uvSTRg udSTR\uvÜSTr\udSTR uvÜST\uvÜST uv-SHI2r\uvSTR\uvSHI2l- udSTR\dBS\uvSTR\dBS\udSTR udSTR\dBS\uvSTR\dBS\udSTR udSTR\dBS\uvSTR\dBS\udSTR udSTR\dBS\uvSTR\dBS\udSTR uvSHI2l-\uvSTR\uv-SHI2r uvSTRf\uvSTRg udSTR!~dMFADEf\uvSTR\udSTR!~dMFADEf ~~ ~~ ~~ to [[28th Street (BMT Broadway Line)|28 St]] uvSTR!~MFADEf ~~ ~~ ~~ to [[14th Street–Union Square (BMT Broadway Line)|14 St]] }} [[File:34th BMT SB platform music jeh.JPG|thumb|220px|Girl using the ''REACH New York, An Urban Musical Instrument'' rack]] }} '''34th Street–Herald Square''' on the BMT Broadway Line is an express station that has four tracks and two [[island platform]]s. This level opened several years after the opening of the Port Authority Trans-Hudson station; the Sixth Avenue line platforms were built later. Each platform has three staircases and one elevator to the main mezzanine on the north half and another staircase at the extreme south end to 32nd Street. North of the station are [[diamond crossover]]s in both directions that are used by '''N''' trains on weekdays when they operate express in Manhattan. Because Queens-bound '''N''' trains switch from the express to the local track north of this station, trains are often held here until another train arrives on the opposite track. Depending on the schedule, they may not leave in the same order in which they arrived. This causes confusion among riders as they run back and forth on the northbound platform trying to catch the train that will leave first. This is also true at other stations where two services that run to the same destination stop at the same platform but do not stop on the same side of the platform, such as [[Franklin Avenue (IRT Eastern Parkway Line)|Franklin Avenue]] (southbound '''[[2 (New York City Subway service)|2]]''' and '''[[5 (New York City Subway service)|5]]''' trains), [[Canal Street (IND Eighth Avenue Line)|Canal Street]] ('''[[A (New York City Subway service)|A]]''', '''[[C (New York City Subway service)|C]]''' and '''[[E (New York City Subway service)|E]]''' trains), [[59th Street–Columbus Circle (IND Eighth Avenue Line)|59th Street–Columbus Circle]] (southbound '''B''' and '''D''' trains), [[Queens Plaza (IND Queens Boulevard Line)|Queens Plaza]] ('''E''', '''M''' and '''R''' trains) and [[Essex Street (BMT Nassau Street Line)|Essex Street]] (outbound '''[[J/Z (New York City Subway service)|J/Z]]''' and '''M''' trains). ''[[The New York Times]]'' calls this ''The Subway Shuffle''.[https://www.nytimes.com/video/2012/07/24/nyregion/100000001674657/the-subway-shuffle.html The Subway Shuffle] In 1996, artist [[Christopher Janney]] installed "REACH New York, An Urban Musical Instrument." The piece consists of green racks with sensors hanging along the platforms. Waving one's hands in front of the sensors creates a corresponding sound from the rack. {{-}} == IND Sixth Avenue Line platforms == {{Infobox NYCS | name = 34 Street–Herald Square | image = 34th Street, 6th Avenue IND.JPG | image_caption = | bg_color = #FF6E1A | division = IND | line = [[IND Sixth Avenue Line]] | service = Sixth | platforms = 2 [[island platform]]s
[[cross-platform interchange]] | tracks = 4 | accessible = yes | open_date = {{start date and age|1940|12|15}} | code = 227 | wifi = yes | next_north = {{NYCS next | station=42nd Street–Bryant Park | line=IND Sixth Avenue Line | service=Sixth}} | next_south = {{NYCS next | station=23rd Street | line=IND Sixth Avenue Line | service=Sixth local}}
{{NYCS next | type=express | line=IND Sixth Avenue Line | station=West Fourth Street–Washington Square | service=Sixth express}} | next_north_acc = {{NYCS next | line=IND Sixth Avenue Line | station=47th–50th Streets–Rockefeller Center | service=Sixth}} | next_south_acc = {{NYCS next | line=IND Sixth Avenue Line | station=West Fourth Street–Washington Square | service=Sixth}} | legend = {{NYCS infobox legend|alltimes}}{{NYCS infobox legend|weekdaysonly}} }} {{Stack|float=right| {{Routemap |title=Track layout |title-bg=#{{NYCS color|Sixth}} |title-color=white |legend =track |map=numN330 uvSTR!~MFADEg\uvSTR!~MFADEg ~~ ~~ ~~ to [[42nd Street–Bryant Park (IND Sixth Avenue Line)|42 St]] uvSTRf\uvSTRg uvÜST\uvÜSTr udSTR\uvÜST\udSTR uvÜSTr\uvÜST udSTR\uvÜST\udSTR uv-SHI2r\uvSTR\uvSHI2l- udSTR\dBS\uvSTR\dBS\udSTR udSTR\dBS\uvSTR\dBS\udSTR udSTR\dBS\uvSTR\dBS\udSTR udSTR\dBS\uvSTR\dBS\udSTR uvSHI2l-\uvSTR\uv-SHI2r uvSTRf\uvSTRg udSTR!~dMFADEf\uvSTR\udSTR!~dMFADEf ~~ ~~ ~~ to [[23rd Street (IND Sixth Avenue Line)|23 St]] uvSTR!~MFADEf ~~ ~~ ~~ to [[West Fourth Street–Washington Square (New York City Subway)|W 4 St]] }} [[File:34th Street Elevator.JPG|thumb|right|220px|Elevator from northbound platform]] }} '''34th Street–Herald Square''' on the IND Sixth Avenue Line is an express station that has four tracks and two island platforms. The mezzanine elevators are at the north end of the station while the staircases to the Manhattan Mall entrance are at the south end. The platforms have numerous stairs and escalators leading to the main mezzanine. Stairs on both platforms lead to a non-accessible ramp leading to the mezzanine. The platforms are not equal in length, as the northbound one is longer than the southbound one. North of this station are numerous crossovers and switches that allow trains from uptown to terminate here on the express tracks during construction and closures. During construction on the IND portion of this station, contractors had to counter problems in their path. For one, the BMT and PATH platforms existed decades before this portion of the station was completed. Constructors had to dig deeper in order to pass the original platforms without interference, as well as avoiding wires and pipes. Prior to the opening of the [[Chrystie Street Connection]] in November 1967, the express tracks only extended to [[bumper block]]s about {{Convert|140|feet|meters}} south of this station, though the tunnels extended for another {{Convert|260|feet|meters}} beyond that. {{-}} == Bombing plot == {{Main|Shahawar Matin Siraj}} On August 28, 2004, [[Shahawar Matin Siraj]] and James Elshafay were arrested for planning to bomb the Herald Square station during the [[2004 Republican National Convention]]. Elshafay cooperated with prosecutors and received a plea deal; Siraj was convicted of conspiracy on four counts, the most serious of which was plotting to bomb a public transportation system, in 2006 and was sentenced to 30 years in prison in 2007.* {{cite news |first=John |last=Marzulli |title=Win in Terror War: Herald Sq. bomb plotter guilty, NYPD vindicated |url=http://www.nydailynews.com/archives/news/2006/05/25/2006-05-25_win_in_terror_war__herald_sq.html |newspaper=[[Daily News (New York)|Daily News]] |date=May 25, 2006 |accessdate=April 14, 2010 }}{{Dead link|date=September 2018 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }} * {{cite news |first=William K. |last=Rashbaum |title=Guilty Verdict in Plot to Bomb Subway Station |url=https://www.nytimes.com/2006/05/25/nyregion/25herald.html |newspaper=[[The New York Times]] |date=May 25, 2006 |accessdate=April 14, 2010 }} * {{cite news |first=William K. |last=Rashbaum |title=Man Gets 30 Years in Subway Bomb Plot |url=https://www.nytimes.com/2007/01/09/nyregion/09plot.html |newspaper=[[The New York Times]] |date=January 9, 2007 |accessdate=April 14, 2010 }} * {{Cite news |last= |title= Band of brothers.(United States v. block east of the 34th Street entrances * [[Manhattan Mall]], in which the 32nd Street entrance is located * [[Herald Square]], directly in between the 34th Street entrances * [[Macy's Herald Square]], near the northwestern entrance at 34th Street * [[Pennsylvania Station (New York City)|Penn Station]] and [[Madison Square Garden]], both one block west of the 32nd Street entrance == {{infobox Organization |name = Academy of International Business (AIB) |image = Academy of International Business (logo).png |image_border = |size = 188px |caption = The logo of AIB |abbreviation = AIB |formation = 1959 |type = [[Professional body]] |status = Association |purpose = Educational |headquarters = East Lansing, Michigan, USA |location = |region_served = |membership = 3187+ in 86 countries |leader_title = President |leader_name = Mary Ann Von Glinow |main_organ = Executive Board |affiliations = AIB Foundation |website = http://aib.msu.edu/ |remarks = }}
'''Academy of International Business''' ('''AIB''') is the leading association of international business [[scholars]] and specialists. Established in 1959, it has over 3000 members in about 72 countries. Membership is open to organizations as well as individuals. The objectives of the Academy of International Business are to foster education and advance professional standards in the field of international business.<ref>[http://aib.msu.edu/aboutaibmission.asp AIB - Mission<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
==Publications== AIB publishes the [[Journal of International Business Studies]] (JIBS). JIBS is the premier scholarly journal in the field of international business and is published nine times a year. JIBS is consistently ranked as one of the highest quality journals in the business and management fields.<ref>[http://www.harzing.com/resources.htm#/jql.htm Harzing.com - Research in International and Cross-cultural Management<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> It is also highly rated by the [[Social Sciences Citation Index]] (2009 5-year Impact Factor: 5.727, 6th out of 87 in the Business category; 7th out of 112 in the Management category).<ref>[http://www.jibs.net/ Journal of International Business Studies<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
AIB also publishes a quarterly newsletter, and the proceedings of its annual conference.<ref>[http://aib.msu.edu/publications/ AIB - Publications<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
==Conferences== The Annual Meeting of the Academy of International Business is held each year in late June or early July. Due to AIB's geographically diverse membership, the location of its annual meeting rotates amongst the continents.
* 2004 - [[Stockholm]] * 2005 - [[Quebec City]] * 2006 - [[Beijing]] * 2007 - [[Indianapolis]] * 2008 - [[Milan]] AIB celebrated its 50th anniversary. * 2009 - [[San Diego]] * 2010 - [[Rio de Janeiro]] * 2011 - [[Nagoya]] * 2012 - [[Washington, D.C.]] * 2013 - [[Istanbul]] * 2014 - [[Vancouver]] * 2015 - [[Bangalore]] * 2016 - [[New Orleans]] * 2017 - [[Dubai]] * 2018 - [[Minneapolis]]
==Chapters== AIB currently has 16 Chapters,<ref>[http://aib.msu.edu/community/chapterlist.asp AIB - List of Chapters<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> primarily organized around particular geographic areas to provide its members with additional opportunities for the exchange of ideas, for the presentation of research, and for professional contacts at geographically closer locations. Each chapter organizes an annual regional conference and may also publish its own newsletter and conference proceedings.
==Affiliations== The AIB Foundation is a separate, incorporated [[not-for-profit]] entity that funds projects that advance the cause of international business.<ref>[http://aib.msu.edu/aibfoundation.asp AIB - Academy of International Business Foundation<!-- Bot generated title -->] {{webarchive |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20080514151426/http://aib.msu.edu/aibfoundation.asp |date=May 14, 2008 }}</ref> The Foundation solicits funds from AIB members, corporations, and other sources. Ram Milan
==References== {{Reflist}}
== External links == *[http://aib.msu.edu/ Academy of International Business (AIB)] *[http://www.jibs.net/ Journal of International Business Studies (JIBS)]

revision.text:
'''Aisling Maria Burnand''', [[Order of the British Empire|MBE]] (born 22 December 1964) is a British business executive and consultant. In 2009 she joined [[Cancer Research UK]] as Executive Director of Policy & Public Affairs.<ref name=CRUK/> in 2013 she became chief executive of the Association of Medical Research Charities.<ref>[https://beta.companieshouse.gov.uk/company/02107400/officers Association of Medical Research Charities profile], companieshouse.gov.uk; accessed 24 April 2016.</ref>
==Career== Burnand worked as head of international [[media relations]] for [[Rhône-Poulenc]] in Paris, then as a director at the Rowland Company, a [[London]]-based public affairs consultancy.<ref> [http://www.campaignlive.co.uk/news/97064/ Burnand to bioindustry body public affairs role], [[Campaign (magazine)|''Campaign '']], 18 September 1998.</ref>
She joined the UK BioIndustry Association as its first Director of Public Affairs in 1998, when the UK [[biotechnology]] industry was in its infancy.<ref name=interview2007>[http://business.scotsman.com/biotechnology/Testing-times-for-biotech-champion.3347559.jp Testing times for biotech champion], interview in ''[[The Scotsman]]'', 11 February 2007.</ref> The Association now represents more than three hundred UK biotech companies. In 2001 Burnand became Deputy Chief Executive, and from 2003 until December 2009 she was Chief Executive. She was succeeded by Nigel Gaymond.<ref name=BIA2009>[http://www.bioindustry.org/biodocuments/BIA_Annual_Review_2009.pdf BIA Annual Review 2009]{{Dead link|date=October 2018 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }}</ref><ref>[http://www.nzbio.org.nz/default.aspx?page=20&news=4272 New CEO of UK BioIndustry Association announced] {{Webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20100515005706/http://nzbio.org.nz/default.aspx?page=20&news=4272 |date=2010-05-15 }}, NZBIO, 10 December 2009.</ref>
At the BIA, Burnand lobbied on behalf of [[stem cell]] research, and supported the passage of the [[Serious Organised Crime and Police Act 2005]], which gives greater protection for [[medical research]]ers from [[animal rights]] extremists and other threats.<ref name=MBE>[http://www.mednous.com/appointment/bioindustry-association-executive-awarded-mbe BioIndustry Association executive awarded MBE], MedNous.com, 18 June 2007</ref> She also had to reassure the public about medicines based on [[monoclonal antibodies]] when six volunteers suffered severse adverse reactions during a [[clinical trial]] at [[Northwick Park Hospital]] in 2006.<ref name=interview2007/>
In 2007 she was awarded an [[Order of the British Empire|MBE]] for services to science.<ref name=MBE/>
She joined [[Cancer Research UK]] in 2009. As Executive Director of Policy & Public Affairs, she has responsibility for the charity's policies on cancer, science and charity issues, seeking along with others to influence politicians and civil servants on issues of importance to cancer patients.<ref name=CRUK>[http://aboutus.cancerresearchuk.org/who-we-are/how-we-are-governed/executive-board Profile], Cancer Research UK; retrieved 23 December 2010.</ref>
==References== {{Reflist}}
{{DEFAULTSORT:Burnand, Aisling}} [[Category:1964 births]] [[Category:British businesspeople]] [[Category:British people of Irish descent]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Members of the Order of the British Empire]] [[Category:Place of birth missing (living people)]]

{{Infobox person | name = Alexander Khaminsky | image = Alexander Haminsky.jpg | alt = | caption = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1966|06|30}} | birth_place = [[Moscow]], [[USSR]] | nationality = | occupation = lawyer, social activist, human rights activist | years_active = | known_for = | notable_works = }} '''Alexander Mikhailovich Khaminsky''' ({{lang-rus|Алекса́ндр Миха́йлович Хами́нский}}; born 30 June 1966) is a Russian social activist, lawyer, human rights activist, and health professional.
He is a member of Public Council under the [[Moscow City Police]]. He is also a counselor and an expert of several public authorities including the [[Presidential Council for Civil Society and Human Rights]], [[Civic Chamber of the Russian Federation]], Directorate of the [[Civic Chamber of the Russian Federation]], and State Inspection of Assay Supervision in Moscow and Moscow oblast’.<ref name="Компания">{{cite web |last=Орешкина |first=Анна |title=Остаться в своем уме. Зачем успешному юристу частная психиатрическая клиника |url=http://ko.ru/keys/item/131762-ostatsya-v-svoem-ume |date=2016-01-27 |publisher=Компания |accessdate=2016-12-20 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161220143548/http://ko.ru/keys/item/131762-ostatsya-v-svoem-ume |archivedate=2016-12-20}}</ref>
Alexander Khaminsky is a chairman of the [[Voluntary association|non-profit partnership]] management “Republican Law Society”<ref>{{cite web |title=Госмонополия всегда против хорошей рыночной конкуренции |url=http://fedpress.ru/expertsovet/expert_mnenie/gosmonopoliya-vsegda-protiv-khoroshei-rynochnoi-konkurentsii |date=2016-05-10 |publisher=ФедералПресс |accessdate=2016-12-20 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161220142027/http://fedpress.ru/expertsovet/expert_mnenie/gosmonopoliya-vsegda-protiv-khoroshei-rynochnoi-konkurentsii |archivedate=2016-12-20}}</ref>, founder of the interregional public organization “Republican Consumer Rights Protection Society”, founder and leader of the joint-stock company «Scientific Diagnostic Center of Clinical Psychiatry», founder of the regional public organization “Moscow Society of Psychiatrists”<ref name="Компания" />, chief editor of the magazine “Moscow – Tel-Aviv”<ref>{{cite web |title=Редакция: Главный редактор Александр Хаминский |url=http://mos-tlv.ru/usersinfo/redaction/ |date=2016-12-26 |publisher=Москва — Тель-Авив |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226011830/http://mos-tlv.ru/usersinfo/redaction/ |archivedate=2016-12-26}}</ref>, publisher and chief editor of the magazine “AH!”<ref name="АХ">{{cite web |last=Хаминский |first=Александр |title=В начале было слово «АХ!» |url=https://snob.ru/profile/29950/blog/114590 |date=2016-10-06 |publisher=Сноб |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226022015/https://snob.ru/profile/29950/blog/114590 |archivedate=2016-12-26}}</ref>, member of “Congress-collegium”.<ref>[http://con-col.com/members/company/company145.html/ АЛЕКСАНДР ХАМИНСКИЙ] {{webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20180317172610/http://con-col.com/members/company/company145.html/ |date=2018-03-17 }}</ref>
In addition to professional activities, he is involved in charity work and sports, and promotes a healthy lifestyle.<ref>{{cite web |title=«Когда много работаешь и мало спишь, заставить организм не сбавлять обороты может только спорт» |url=http://fitnessguides.ru/khaminsky/ |date=2016-12-25 |publisher=FitnessGuides |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225201318/http://fitnessguides.ru/khaminsky/ |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref>
In the mass media, he serves as an expert and specialist in law, security, psychiatry, psychology, social policy and interethnic relations.<ref name="Компания" />
== Biography ==
Alexander was born on June 30, 1966, in Moscow into a family of non-manual workers.
He has three university degrees: technic education ([[Russian State University of Tourism and Services Studies]]), commercial education ([[Moscow State University]]) and legal education ([[Russian State University for the Humanities]]). He underwent an advanced training in the organization of health care and management of medical institutions.
From 1988 to 1992 he carried out business activities in consumer good industry (Moscow Regional House of Models, joint Soviet-Swiss enterprise “Interexpression”, small enterprise “Khars”.<ref name="Компания" /> In June 1991, “[[Moskovskaya Pravda]]” compared the production volumes of Khaminsky’s enterprise with similar indicators of large garment factories.<ref>{{cite journal |author = Гармизе, Т. |editor= |format= |url= |title= «Харс» почти не виден (25-06-1991) |type= Газета |origyear= | agency = |edition= [[Moskovskaya Pravda]] |location= |date= |year= |publisher= |at= |volume= |issue= |number= |pages = |page= |series= |isbn = |issn = |doi = |bibcode = |arxiv = |pmid = |ref= |archiveurl = |archivedate = |language= |quote= }}</ref>
Since 1992, he works in the field of financial, arbitration, administrative and criminal law. From 1995 to 1999 he was a parliamentary assistant of Kobylkin V.F., the [[State Duma]] Deputy.
Since 2008, he is engaged in journalistic activities, and since 2015, he is engaged in editing and publishing.
Alexander Khaminsky is a constant speaker of the social and political programs of the [[Channel One Russia]], TV and radio company “Mir”, [[Moscow 24 (TV channel)|Moscow 24]], 360° Podmoskovie, [[NTV (Russia)|NTV]], [[REN TV]] channels, Kommersant FM radio station, he writes columns in news and professional media, such as FederPress, Dni.ru, Clerk.ru and others.<ref name="Мир">{{cite web |author=Жестков Александр |title=Далекий-далекий Дальний Восток |url=http://mirtv.ru/video/25494/ |date=2015-10-26 |publisher=МТРК «Мир» (4'45") |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225234758/http://mirtv.ru/video/25494/ |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref><ref name="360tv">{{cite web |title=Арбитражные суды захлебнутся в потоке дел о банкротстве граждан |url=http://360tv.ru/news/arbitrazhnye-sudy-zahlebnutsja-v-potoke-del-o-bankrotstve-grazhdan--jekspert-35808/ |date=2016-10-07 |publisher=360° |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226000149/http://360tv.ru/news/arbitrazhnye-sudy-zahlebnutsja-v-potoke-del-o-bankrotstve-grazhdan--jekspert-35808/ |archivedate=2016-12-26}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |last=Колганов |first=Григорий |title=«Нафтогаз» пожаловался на Россию: Компания хочет компенсировать потерю активов в Крыму |url=http://www.kommersant.ru/doc/3120351 |date=2016-10-19 |publisher=Коммерсантъ FM |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226004216/http://www.kommersant.ru/doc/3120351 |archivedate=2016-12-26}}</ref><ref name="Дни" /><ref>{{cite web |title=Авторские колонки: Александр Хаминский |url=http://www.klerk.ru/columnists/haminsky/ |date=2016-12-26 |publisher=Клерк.ру |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226033438/http://www.klerk.ru/columnists/haminsky/ |archivedate=2016-12-26}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |last=Хаминский |first=Александр |title=Как адвокаты заказывают музыку |url=http://www.kommersant.ru/doc/3143400 |date=2016-12-05 |publisher=[[Коммерсантъ]]-Деньги № 48 |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226005604/http://www.kommersant.ru/doc/3143400 |archivedate=2016-12-26 |page=9}}</ref>
He is an expert on the following issues: the bankruptcy of [[Transaero Airlines]]<ref name="Мир" /><ref>{{cite web |title=«Трансаэро» три года скрывала свое реальное банкротство |url=http://fedpress.ru/expertsovet/expert_mnenie/transaero-tri-goda-skryvala-svoe-realnoe-bankrotstvo |date=2015-10-13 |publisher=ФедералПресс |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225233801/http://fedpress.ru/expertsovet/expert_mnenie/transaero-tri-goda-skryvala-svoe-realnoe-bankrotstvo |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref>, the bankruptcy of individuals in Russia<ref name="360tv" />, the conflict due to the division of property during the divorce process of [[Fyodor Bondarchuk|Fyodor]] and Svetlana Bondarchuk<ref>{{cite web |last=Хаминский |first=Александр |title=Супруги Бондарчуки: развод, раздел, аплодисменты! |url=https://snob.ru/profile/29950/blog/113343 |date=2016-09-16 |publisher=Сноб |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225225443/https://snob.ru/profile/29950/blog/113343 |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |last=М. |first=Инна |title=Развод и раздел имущества: Федор Бондарчук скрывает капитал от экс-жены? |url=http://www.cosmo.ru/stars/news/09-09-2016/razvod-i-razdel-imushchestva-fedor-bondarchuk-skryvaet-kapital-ot-eks-zheny/ |date=2016-09-09 |publisher=[[Cosmopolitan (magazine)|Cosmopolitan]] |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226001013/http://www.cosmo.ru/stars/news/09-09-2016/razvod-i-razdel-imushchestva-fedor-bondarchuk-skryvaet-kapital-ot-eks-zheny/ |archivedate=2016-12-26 |quote=Юрист Александр Хаминский в своем блоге на «Снобе» расследует данные махинации, ссылаясь на решение Арбитражного суда Санкт-Петербурга.}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |title=Сплетники уверяют, Федору Бондарчуку грозит суд с бывшей женой |url=http://www.goodhouse.ru/stars/news/529712/ |date=2016-09-06 |publisher=Домашний очаг |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226001922/http://www.goodhouse.ru/stars/news/529712/ |archivedate=2016-12-26 |format=Журнал}}</ref>, the violations of the Highway Rules by representatives of the so-called "golden youth"<ref>{{cite web |last=Хаминский |first=Александр |title=Россия объявила войну мажорам-лихачам |url=https://www.dni.ru/auto/2016/12/12/355917.html |date=2016-12-26 |publisher=Дни.ру |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226021314/https://www.dni.ru/auto/2016/12/12/355917.html |archivedate=2016-12-26}}</ref>, the initiation of criminal cases against the leaders of the TFR in 2016<ref name="Дни" />, the practice of using forced labor in Russia as a criminal sanction<ref>{{cite web |last=Хаминский |first=Александр |title=С Нового года в России появится новый вид наказания |url=https://dni.ru/bloggers/2016/10/19/351258.html |date=2016-12-26 |publisher=Дни.ру |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226034021/https://dni.ru/bloggers/2016/10/19/351258.html |archivedate=2016-12-26}}</ref>, the decriminalization of the article on beatings in the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation<ref name="Декриминализация">{{cite web |title=«Декриминализация побоев – странный способ проявить гуманность к тем, кто на неё не способен» |url=http://fedpress.ru/expert-opinion/1646404 |date=2016-06-28 |publisher=ФедералПресс |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225203941/http://fedpress.ru/expert-opinion/1646404 |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref>, the ban of Russian on travel to Egypt and Turkey, the psychological health of the nation, computer and Internet addiction<ref name="Любовная">{{cite web |last=Кузичев |first=Анатолий |title=«Любовная зависимость — это психическое заболевание»: Директор Научно-диагностического центра клинической психиатрии Александр Хаминский в интервью «Ъ FM» |url=http://kommersant.ru/doc/2804077 |date=2015-06-09 |publisher=Коммерсантъ FM |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226060132/http://kommersant.ru/doc/2804077 |archivedate=2016-12-26}}</ref>, the attack on the [[Moscow Choral Synagogue]] in October 2016 and others.<ref name="Напавший">{{cite web |last=Антонова |first=Ирина |title=Напавший на синагогу оказался шизофреником |url=http://www.eg.ru/daily/crime/56606/ |date=2016-10-03 |publisher=Экспресс-газета |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226002953/http://www.eg.ru/daily/crime/56606/ |archivedate=2016-12-26 |quote=Александр Михайлович оказался прав. Преступника увезли на освидетельствование, и вскоре выяснилось, что он состоит на учёте в психо-неврологическом диспансере с диагнозом «шизофрения».}}</ref>
In 2015, Alexander Khaminsky took the role of outside editor, and in 2016 he was appointed the chief editor of the first Jewish glossy magazine “Moscow – Tel-Aviv”.<ref name="Еврей">{{cite web |author=Хаминский, Александр |title=Еврей в России — больше, чем еврей |url=http://mos-tlv.ru/articles/rubrics/litso-s-oblozhki/evrey-v-rossii-bolshe-chem-evrey/ |date=2016-07-06 |publisher=Москва — Тель-Авив |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226012457/http://mos-tlv.ru/articles/rubrics/litso-s-oblozhki/evrey-v-rossii-bolshe-chem-evrey/ |archivedate=2016-12-26}}</ref> Since 2016, Alexander Khaminsky is a publisher and chief editor of the glossy magazine “AH!”.<ref name="АХ" />
== Social activity ==
Alexander Khaminsky is engaged in public activities, he is an expert and counselor to public authorities. He supports bilateral cooperation between state authorities and civil society institutions.<ref>{{cite web|last=Волкова|first=Алёна|title=Сотрудничество органов государственной власти и институтов гражданского общества в вопросах миграции|url=http://planet-today.ru/novosti/obshchestvo/pravo/item/83760-sotrudnichestvo-organov-gosudarstvennoj-vlasti-i-institutov-grazhdanskogo-obshchestva-v-voprosakh-migratsii|date=2018-03-02|publisher=Planet Today|accessdate=2016-12-25|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20180406231057/http://planet-today.ru/novosti/obshchestvo/pravo/item/83760-sotrudnichestvo-organov-gosudarstvennoj-vlasti-i-institutov-grazhdanskogo-obshchestva-v-voprosakh-migratsii|archivedate=2018-04-06}}</ref>
He participates in the life of the Moscow Jewish community in conjunction with the [[Federation of Jewish Communities of the CIS|Federation of Jewish Communities of Russia]], the [[Congress of the Jewish Religious Organizations and Associations in Russia]], the Youth Movement "Shahar", the Euro-Asian Jewish Congress<ref>{{cite web |title=Хануку отметили по-новому |url=http://planet-today.ru/novosti/obshchestvo/vne-politiki/item/29514-khanuku-otmetili-po-novomu |date=2015-12-08 |publisher=Planet-today.ru |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225231735/http://planet-today.ru/novosti/obshchestvo/vne-politiki/item/29514-khanuku-otmetili-po-novomu |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |title=Евреи в Москве широко отметили Рош а-Шана |url=https://dni.ru/photo/2016/10/9/350266.html |date=2016-10-09 |publisher=Дни.ру |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225232019/https://dni.ru/photo/2016/10/9/350266.html |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |title=Московские евреи с песнями и плясками встретили 5777 год |url=http://www.eg.ru/daily/melochi/56871/ |date=2016-10-07 |publisher=Экспресс газета |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225232731/http://www.eg.ru/daily/melochi/56871/ |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref><ref name="Эхо">{{cite web |last=Стоцкий |first=Артем |title=День рождения «Эха Москвы» совпал с еврейским Новым годом |url=http://www.eg.ru/daily/melochi/56929/ |date=2016-10-10 |publisher=Экспресс газета № 41 (1129) |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225233359/http://www.eg.ru/daily/melochi/56929/ |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref> and the [[Russian Council of Muftis]].<ref>{{cite web|last=|first=|title=Как защитить религиозную и культурно-просветительную литературу от судебных ошибок|url=https://muslim.ru/articles/287/18093|date=2017-03-31|publisher=Официальный сайт Совета муфтиев России|accessdate=2018-04-06|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20170402210652/http://www.muslim.ru/articles/287/18093/|archivedate=2017-04-02}}</ref>
He is the head of the project "Moscow is the territory of the law"<ref>{{cite web|last=|first=|title=Александр Хаминский|url=https://snob.ru/profile/29950/about|date=|publisher=Сноб |accessdate=2018-04-06|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20180317164414/https://snob.ru/profile/29950/about|archivedate=2018-03-17}}</ref>, aimed at ensuring interaction between public authorities and civil society institutions.<ref>{{cite web|last=|first=|title=Проект «Москва – территория закона»|url=http://www.haminsky.ru/urisprudenciya/moskva-territoriya-zakona|date=|publisher=Официальный сайт Александр Хаминского|accessdate=2018-04-06|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20180406231057/http://www.haminsky.ru/urisprudenciya/moskva-territoriya-zakona|archivedate=2018-04-06}}</ref>
Since 2017, he is a member of Public Council under the [[Moscow City Police|Main Department of Internal Affairs of the city of Moscow]].<ref>{{cite web|last=|first=|title=Состав Общественного совета|url=https://77.мвд.рф/гу-мвд/ос/состав-ос |date=|publisher=Официальный сайт Министерства внутренних дел Российской Федерации|accessdate=2018-04-06|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20180406231057/https://77.xn--b1aew.xn--p1ai/%D0%B3%D1%83-%D0%BC%D0%B2%D0%B4/%D0%BE%D1%81/%D1%81%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%B2-%D0%BE%D1%81|archivedate=2018-04-06}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |last= |first= |title=В столице началась борьба с «борзотой» |url=http://www.haminsky.ru/news/v-stolice-nachalas-borba-s-borzotoy |date=2017-07-12 |publisher=Официальный сайт Александра Хаминского |accessdate=2018-04-06}}</ref> He participates in different public events as a public watchdog.<ref>{{cite web |last= |first= |title=Члены Общественного совета при ГУ МВД России по г. Москве выступили в роли общественных наблюдателей |url=https://77.мвд.рф/гу-мвд/ос/новости/item/12390547 |date=2018-02-26 |publisher=Официальный сайт Министерства внутренних дел Российской Федерации |accessdate=2018-04-06}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |title=Общественные наблюдатели провели мониторинг нарушений правопорядка в период проведения празднования Дня России |url=https://77.мвд.рф/гу-мвд/ос/новости/item/10469735 |date=2017-06-13 |publisher=Официальный сайт Министерства внутренних дел Российской Федерации |accessdate=2018-04-06}}</ref> Khaminsky’s project aimed at reducing the level of [[protest vote]] during [[Russian presidential election, 2018|presidential election in 2018]] was approved by the Management of the [[Presidential Administration of Russia|Presidential Administration for Internal Policy]].<ref>{{cite web |last= |first= |title=Программа А.М. Хаминского будет учтена Администрацией Президента РФ при подготовке к выборам 2018 года |url=http://www.haminsky.ru/news/programma-a-m-khaminskogo-budet-uchtena-administraciey-prezidenta-rf-pri-podgotovke-k-vyboram-2018-goda |date=2017-08-21 |publisher=Официальный сайт Александра Хаминского |accessdate=2018-04-06}}</ref>
Since 2018, he is an expert on legal and public health issues of the [[Presidential Council for Civil Society and Human Rights]]. He spoke at Council meetings dedicated to the issues of public drug supply and improvement of procedural legislation.<ref>{{cite web |last= |first= |title=Член Общественного совета при ГУ МВД России по г. Москве Александр Хаминский принял участие в специальном заседании СПЧ при Президенте РФ|url=https://77.мвд.рф/гу-мвд/ос/новости/item/12510595|date=2018-03-13|publisher=Официальный сайт Министерства внутренних дел Российской Федерации|accessdate=2018-04-06|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20180331220116/https://77.xn--b1aew.xn--p1ai/%D0%B3%D1%83-%D0%BC%D0%B2%D0%B4/%D0%BE%D1%81/%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B8/item/12510595|archivedate=2018-03-31}}</ref><ref name="77.мвд.рф"/><ref>{{cite web |title=Член Общественного совета при ГУ МВД России по г. Navalny]].<ref>[https://snob.ru/profile/29950/blog/122349 Александр Хаминский: Как новоиспечённый Гапон людей под ОМОН повёл] {{webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20180406231057/https://snob.ru/profile/29950/blog/122349 |date=2018-04-06 }} // Сноб</ref><ref>{{cite web|last=Фоканова|first=Людмила|title=Усманов – |accessdate=2017-08-08|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20170809040727/https://dni.ru/society/2017/5/24/370036.html|archivedate=2017-08-09|quote=Напомним, Навальный, получивший от юриста и Nechaev]], [[Nikolai Svanidze]] and [[Valery Solovei]] held on the eve of [[Russian presidential election, 2018|presidential election in 2018]].<ref>{{cite web |last=Волкова |first=Алёна |accessdate=2018-04-06 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20180318120308/http://planet-today.ru/novosti/politika/item/84163-entry-poll-lidery-mnenij-obsudili-preimushchestva-i-nedostatki-osnovnykh-kandidatov-v-prezidenty-rossii == Charity work ==
Alexander Khaminsky does charity work and promotes volunteering.<ref name="АХ" /><ref name="Дни">{{cite web |last=Хаминский |first=Александр |title=Громкие задержания в СКР: Истоки конфликта |url=https://dni.ru/bloggers/2016/7/20/342881.html |date=2016-07-20 |publisher=Дни.ру |accessdate=2016-12-26 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161226003728/https://dni.ru/bloggers/2016/7/20/342881.html |archivedate=2016-12-26}}</ref> He donates his funds to organize charitable and cultural events.<ref>{{cite web |last=Л'емон |first=Мила |title=Еврейская молодежь отметила праздник «Ханукальной феерией» |url=http://ftimes.ru/society/16919-evrejskaya-molodezh-otmetila-prazdnik-xanukalnoj-feeriej.html |date=2015-12-08 |publisher=FTimes.ru |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225212207/http://ftimes.ru/society/16919-evrejskaya-molodezh-otmetila-prazdnik-xanukalnoj-feeriej.html |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref>
On a regular basis, he cooperates with charitable foundations including “Downside Up”, [[Gosha Kutsenko]]’s “Step together”, with volunteer organizations such as “Asia Co” and “Alabai 911”, participates in charitable auctions and concerts, and organizes such events in cooperation with famous sportsmen [[Konstantin Tszyu]], [[Dmitry Sennikov]], [[Daniil Kvyat]] and others.<ref>{{cite web |last=Гальперин |first=Вячеслав |title=Константин Цзю побил оперу |url=http://www.kommersant.ru/doc/1337112 |date=2010-03-15 |publisher=[[Коммерсантъ]] |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225210547/http://www.kommersant.ru/doc/1337112 |archivedate=2016-12-25 |page=6 |quote=А когда цена дошла до рекордной для этого аукциона суммы в 200 тыс. руб., за лот неожиданно решил побороться председатель правления Республиканского юридического общества Александр Хаминский. Он приобрел его за 260 тыс. руб.}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |last=Кукарцева |first=Анна |title=Портрет Фабио Капелло работы футболиста Дмитрия Сенникова ушел с молотка за 188 тысяч рублей |url=http://www.kp.ru/daily/25968/2906078/ |date=2012-10-17 |publisher=[[Комсомольская правда]] |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20150907095728/http://www.kp.ru/daily/25968/2906078/ |archivedate=2015-09-07 |quote=В итоге победителем и обладателем главного лота стал известный московский юрист, один из главных спонсоров отечественной психиатрии Александр Хаминский.}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |title=Дорогу – юным талантам |url=http://planet-today.ru/novosti/kultura/item/28632-dorogu-yunym-talantam |date=2015-11-27 |publisher=Planet-today.ru |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225211434/http://planet-today.ru/novosti/kultura/item/28632-dorogu-yunym-talantam |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |title=Автопробег «Детская мечта» привлечет внимание к проблеме лечения детей, нуждающихся в психологической и психиатрической помощи |url=http://www.newc.info/news/9856/ |date=2015-10-09 |publisher=Новый Крым |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225211832/http://www.newc.info/news/9856/ |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref>
== Jurisprudence ==
Alexander Khaminsky represents the interests of state and judicial authorities’ constituents. He participates in drawing up and writing methodical manuals, draft regulations, certificates and conclusions on legal issues for mentioned authorities. His clients include Mercury, [[Polymetal International]], [[TsUM (Moscow)|TsUM]], [[SU-155]], [[MNIIRE Altair]], [[Microgen]], [[Panasonic]] and others.
Since 1992, a separate unit "Hars Consulting" has been allocated in enterprise "Khars" structure in order to provide services in the field of tax optimization. Two years later, in 1994, he collected an auditor's certificate and began to carry out auditing activities. Since 1996, he has been specializing in tax law and arbitration proceedings. In 1998-2001 Alexander Khaminsky consulted on bankruptcy issues, and also was integral to the bankruptcy proceedings of commercial banks and manufacturing enterprises.<ref name="Компания" />
In 2002, he initiated the establishment of the Republican Legal Society and was elected chairman of its management board. In 2004-2005, employees of this society took part in the reorganization of medical institutions of RAMS, the creation of the Scientific Center of Neurology and the Scientific Center of Immunology of RAMS.<ref name="Компания" /> In 2007, the Republican Legal Society provided free assistance in the technical equipment of the Central Internal Affairs Directorate in Moscow.
In 2008-2011, Alexander Khaminsky coordinated activities of the Public Reception Office of the Federal Service for Consumer Rights Protection in Moscow.<ref name="Компания" />
Alexander Khaminsky introduced a number of motions on legislative initiatives to President Vladimir Putin, the government of the Russian Federation, the Federation Council and Senator [[Elena Mizulina]] (to create the State Information Agency and the State Agency for Legal Aid, to integrate the civil partnership in the civil legislation, to decriminalize the [[Criminal Code of Russia]], to systematize the terminology used in various branches of law, and other).<ref name="Декриминализация" /><ref>{{cite web |last=Ирина |first=Антонова |title=Гражданский брак могут признать настоящим |url=http://www.eg.ru/daily/melochi/58053/ |date=2016-11-03 |publisher=Экспресс газета |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225202727/http://www.eg.ru/daily/melochi/58053/ |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |title=Законы против коллекторского беспредела не нужны |url=http://fedpress.ru/expertsovet/expert_mnenie/zakony-protiv-kollektorskogo-bespredela-ne-nuzhny |date=2016-03-02 |publisher=ФедералПресс |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225203310/http://fedpress.ru/expertsovet/expert_mnenie/zakony-protiv-kollektorskogo-bespredela-ne-nuzhny |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |title=Главное в борьбе с коррупцией – неотвратимость наказания |url=http://fedpress.ru/expertsovet/expert_mnenie/glavnoe-v-borbe-s-korruptsiei-neotvratimost-nakazaniya |date=2015-11-02 |publisher=ФедералПресс |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225203650/http://fedpress.ru/expertsovet/expert_mnenie/glavnoe-v-borbe-s-korruptsiei-neotvratimost-nakazaniya |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |last=Дубичева |first=Ксения |title=Взносы — по совести: Из-за отсутствия системы штрафов автовладельцы не платят за парковки |url=https://rg.ru/2016/04/26/reg-urfo/iz-za-otsutstviia-shtrafov-v-ekaterinburge-perestali-platit-za-parkovku.html |date=2016-04-26 |publisher=[[Российская газета]] |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225204316/https://rg.ru/2016/04/26/reg-urfo/iz-za-otsutstviia-shtrafov-v-ekaterinburge-perestali-platit-za-parkovku.html |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref>
== Psychiatry ==
In 2010, Khaminsky’s funds were used to establish the Scientific Diagnostic Center of Clinical Psychiatry, a non-governmental medical psychiatric institution that carries out, in addition to diagnosing and treating psychiatric disorders<ref name="Любовная" />, scientific activity, psychiatric examination and forensic psychiatric analysis.<ref>{{cite web |title=Проект резолюции Первого общественно-политического Форума «Душевное здоровье подрастающего поколения общая забота государства и общества» |url=https://refdb.ru/look/2056728.html |date=2011-05-31 |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225204741/https://refdb.ru/look/2056728.html |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref> Since foundation, Khaminsky has been Chairman of the Board of Directors of the Center, and since 2013, he has been CEO.<ref name="Компания" /><ref>{{cite web |title=Проект резолюции Первого общественно-политического Форума «Душевное здоровье подрастающего поколения общая забота государства и общества» |url=https://refdb.ru/look/2056728.html |date=2011-05-31 |accessdate=2016-12-25 |archiveurl=https://archive.li/20161225204741/https://refdb.ru/look/2056728.html |archivedate=2016-12-25}}</ref>
Since 2013, the Center examines citizens in order to find the indications for [[Sex reassignment surgery|sex-change operations]].<ref name="Любовная" />
In 2015, during XVI Congress of the Russian Society of Psychiatrists in Kazan, five reports, written by Alexander Khaminsky, were presented. These reports were written coauthored with physicians and researchers of the Center for genetic factors influence, evaluation of electroencephalography (spectral and coherent analysis) results on the dynamics of development of mental disorders, methods of treatment the early childhood [[schizophrenia]].<ref>{{cite web|author=Незнанов, Н. Г.|title=XVI съезд психиатров России. Всероссийская научно-практическая конференция с международным участием «Психиатрия на этапах реформ: проблемы и перспективы»|url=http://psychiatr.ru/download/2292?view=1&name=XVI-ROP-2015_abstr+(2).pdf|date=2015|publisher=Альта Астра|accessdate=2016-12-25|location=СПб|format=PDF|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20160629073449/http://psychiatr.ru/download/2292?view=1&name=XVI-ROP-2015_abstr+%282%29.pdf|archivedate=2016-06-29}}</ref>
In 2015, the Institute of Psychotherapy and Clinical Psychology, together with the Center, conducted the first All-Russian scientific and practical conference "Actual issues of cognitive psychotherapy, neurology and psychiatry". At the opening of this conference Alexander Khaminsky, the chairman of the organizing committee of the forum, made a report on the organization of interaction of specialists in various fields during diagnosis and treatment of diseases of the cognitive sphere.<ref name="Компания" /><ref>{{cite book| author = Хаминский А. М., Вильянов В. Б., Немкова С. А. | chapter = | chapter-url = | format = | url = http://webirbis.spsl.nsc.ru/irbis64r_01/cgi/cgiirbis_64.exe?Z21ID=&I21DBN=CAT_PRINT&P21DBN=CAT&S21STN=1&S21REF=&S21FMT=FULLW_print&C21COM=S&S21CNR=555&S21P01=0&S21P02=1&S21P03=A=&S21STR=Хаминский,%20А.%20М. | title = Актуальные вопросы психиатрии, неврологии и психотерапии | orig-year = | agency = | edition = {{nowrap|300 экз}} |location= М. |year= 2015 |publisher= Перо |at= |volume= |issue = | pages = | page = | series = | isbn = 978-5-906835-10-9| ref = }}</ref>

Ответственность за правонарушения в сфере обращения ювелирных изделий | orig-year = | agency = | edition = |location= Москва |year= 2009 |publisher= Медиа Академия |at= |volume= |issue = | pages = | page = | series = | isbn = 978-5-903798-07-0| ref = }} * {{cite book| author = | chapter = | chapter-url = | format = | url = | title = Актуальные вопросы психиатрии, неврологии и психотерапии: Сборник научных трудов, посвященный 5-летию НДЦ клинической психиатрии | orig-year = | agency = | edition = {{nowrap|300 экз}} |location= Москва |year= 2015 |publisher= Перо |at= |volume= |issue = | pages = | page = | series = | isbn = 978-5-906835-10-9| ref = }} * {{cite book| author = | chapter = | chapter-url = | format = | url = http://www.rumvi.com/products/ebook/пейсбук/a5f0d24c-5ca8-4133-aa51-93685e748fc6/preview/preview.html | title = Пейсбук | orig-year = | agency = | edition = {{nowrap|3000 экз}} |location= Москва |year= 2016 |publisher= Перо |at= |volume= |issue = | pages = | page = | series = | isbn = 978-5-906871-88-6| ref = }} * {{cite book| author = | chapter = | chapter-url = | format = | url = | title = Выявление и профилактика правонарушений в сфере общественного питания | orig-year = | agency = | edition = {{nowrap|1000 экз}} |location= Москва |year= 2016 |publisher= Перо |at= |volume= |issue = | pages = | page = | series = | isbn = 978-5-00122-120-3| ref = }} * {{cite book| author = | chapter = | chapter-url = | format = | url = | title = Правовые и психологические аспекты работы сотрудников правоохранительных и иных государственных органов на массовых мероприятиях | orig-year = | agency = | edition = |location= Москва |year= 2018 |publisher= Перо |at= |volume= |issue = | pages = | page = | series = | isbn = 978-5-00122-120-3| ref = }}

{{Infobox person |name=Alton Hardy Howard |image = |caption= |nationality=[[United States|American]] |birth_name= |birth_date={{birth date|1925|3|28}} |death_date={{death date and age|2006|10|29|1925|3|28}} |birth_place= Rocky Branch Community
[[Union Parish, Louisiana|Union Parish]], [[Louisiana]], USA |death_place= |resting_place=Rocky Branch Cemetery in Union Parish |residence=[[West Monroe, Louisiana|West Monroe]]
[[Ouachita Parish, Louisiana|Ouachita Parish]], Louisiana |occupation=[[Business]]man
Co-founder, [[Howard Brothers Discount Stores]]
Gospel [[songwriter]] |spouse= Mamie Jean Meador Howard |children=John Howard
Mary H. Owen
Janice H. Owen |relations=Brothers:
[[V. E. Howard]]
[[W. L. "Jack" Howard]]
[[Korie Robertson]] (granddaughter) |footnotes= }} '''Alton Hardy Howard''' (March 28, 1925 – October 29, 2006) was a [[business]]man, author, and a [[gospel]] [[songwriter]] from [[West Monroe, Louisiana|West Monroe]] in [[Ouachita Parish, Louisiana|Ouachita Parish]] in northeastern [[Louisiana]]. ==Background== Howard was the sixth of seven children born in the Rocky Branch community near [[Farmerville, Louisiana|Farmerville]] in [[Union Parish, Louisiana|Union Parish]] in [[North Louisiana]], to a [[Church of Christ]] couple, Elisha John "Hardy" Howard (1889-1974) and the former Corinne Smith (1888-1971). Older brother [[V. E. Howard|Verna Elisha Howard]] (was a Church of christ clergyman for more than four decades who founded the [[Texas]]-based ''International Gospel Hour''. Still another older brother, [[W. L. "Jack" Howard]], was Alton's business partner and the [[mayor]] of [[Monroe, Louisiana|Monroe]] from 1956 to 1972 to 1976 to 1978. The youngest of the Howard siblings, Kelton Leroy Howard (1928-1994), died exactly two weeks after the passing of Jack Howard.{{cite web|url=http://la-cemeteries.com/Transcriptions/Union/RockyBranchGenealogyPage1.htm|title=Rocky Branch Cemetery records|publisher=la-cemeteries.com|accessdate=July 12, 2013}} Howard was predeceased by two sisters, Euphra H. Terry (1914-1980) and Cassyle H. McMurry (1918-1989).{{cite web|url=http://www.thenewsstar.com/article/20061030/OBITUARIES/610300327/ALTON-HARDY-HOWARD|title=Alton Hardy Howard, October 30, 2006|publisher=''[[The News-Star|Monroe News-Star]]''|accessdate=July 12, 2013|archive-url=https://archive.is/20130713030937/http://www.thenewsstar.com/article/20061030/OBITUARIES/610300327/ALTON-HARDY-HOWARD|archive-date=2013-07-13|dead-url=yes|df=}} During [[World War II]], Howard served in the [[Ninth Air Force]] and flew twelve missions over [[Germany]] as a gunner on a [[Martin B-26 Marauder|B26]] bomber.{{cite web|url=http://www.hymntime.com/tch/bio/h/o/w/howard_ah.htm|title=Alton Hardy Howard (1925-2006)|publisher=hymntime.com|accessdate=July 12, 2013}} ==Business and church activities== In 1946, Alton and Jack Howard co-founded Howard Brothers Jewelers; in 1959, the regional [[chain store|chain]], [[Howard Brothers Discount Stores]]. In 1969, he started Howard Publishing Company and, along with his son, John Howard, launched in 1984 Super Saver Wholesale Warehouse Club. Howard further owned an insurance agency, several restaurants, clothing stores, oil and gas operations, and his music business. He also developed several subdivisions He was one of the founders and a longtime elder (1963-2004) of the White's Ferry Road Church of Christ in West Monroe. In 1967, he established Camp Ch-Yo-Ca, a Christian youth camp. He wrote several books and gospel songs. His Howard hymnals have sold more than three million copies and are used in churches worldwide.{{cite web|url=http://www.christianchronicle.org/article512~Songbook_publisher,_entrepreneur_Howard_dies_at_age_81|title="Songbook publisher, entrepreneur Howard dies at age 81," November 1, 2006|publisher=christianchronicle.org|accessdate=July 12, 2013}}"Alton Howard remembered for business, religious involvement", ''The Ouachita Citizen'', [[West Monroe, Louisiana|West Monroe]], [[Louisiana]], November 2, 2006, accessed July 12, 2013 Howard worked to establish "World Radio", an international ministry which broadcasts the gospel of [[Jesus Christ]] in native languages. ==Death and legacy== Howard was married to the former Mamie Jean Meador (1927-2013), a native of [[Arkadelphia, Arkansas|Arkadelphia]], [[Arkansas]], and the daughter of Ben and Willie Meador. In addition to son John and his wife Chrys (parents of [[Korie Robertson]], the spouse of the aforementioned Willie Robertson) the Howards had two daughters— Mary Howard Owen (whose husband is Mac) and Janice Howard Owen (with husband David). Alton and Jean Howard are interred with his primary family members, except for brother Jack Howard, at the Rocky Branch Cemetery in Union Parish.{{cite web|url=http://www.tributes.com/show/Mamie-Jean-Meador-Howard-96000309|title=Mamie Jean Meador Howard|publisher=tributes.com|accessdate=July 12, 2013}} According to Dave Norris, the mayor of West Monroe since 1978, Howard was
a great song writer -- he wrote very powerful music. Some years ago he gave me a copy of a hymnal in which he wrote many, if not all of the hymns. I've gone through, looked at it, and sung them numerous times. ... He was a very important person in a lot of ways, but I think his contributions to the church were the things that were closest to his heart and meant the most to him. He certainly made a great difference in our community ...
[[Louisiana State Senate|State Senator]] [[Mike Walsworth]] of West Monroe, then a [[Louisiana House of Representatives|state representative]], described Howard as "one of the founders of modern West Monroe ... and a great businessman in our community." Howard published the following books and hymnals: *''Songs of the Church'' *''Songs of the Church Twenty-First Century Edition'' *''Songs of Faith and Praise'' *''Money Grow$ on Tree$: How to Make, Manage, and Master Money'' *''Foundations of Faith'' *''Timeless Moments: Sacred Events That Shaped Eternity'' Hymns he wrote include: * God Still Lives * I Believe in Jesus * There's a Light Shining * Where Peace Like a River * There's a Rainbow in the Cloud * Wonderful He Is to Me * I Walk with the King * He Gave Me a Song * Tell Them of Jesus * Sail Away Home * Jesus is Calling * God Heal Our Land ==References== {{reflist}} {{Portalbar|Biography|Louisiana|Christianity|Music|World War II|United States Army}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Howard, Alton Hardy}} [[Category:1925 births]] [[Category:2006 deaths]] [[Category:American members of the Churches of Christ]] [[Category:American military personnel of World War II]] [[Category:American non-fiction writers]] [[Category:American songwriters]] [[Category:Businesspeople from Louisiana]] [[Category:People from Union Parish, Louisiana]] [[Category:People from West Monroe, Louisiana]] [[Category:United States Army Air Forces officers]] [[Category:Howard family (Louisiana)]] [[Category:20th-century American musicians]] [[Category:Songwriters from Louisiana]]

{{Infobox person |name=Angelo Moratti |image=1966–67 Serie A - AC Mantova v Inter Milan - Angelo Moratti.jpg |caption=Angelo Moratti in 1967 |birth_date={{Birth date|1909|11|5|df=yes}} |birth_place=[[Somma Lombardo]], [[Italy]] |death_date = {{death date and age|1981|8|12|1909|11|5|df=yes}} |death_place=[[Viareggio]], [[Italy]] |occupation=Oil Businessman
Owner of [[Internazionale Milano F.C.]] |nationality = {{flagicon|Italy}} [[Italy|Italian]] |salary= |spouse= Erminia Cremonesi |children= 6 (1 adoptive) * Adriana (1932) * Gianmarco (1936) * Mariarosa (Bedy) (1939) * [[Massimo Moratti|Massimo]] (1945) * Gioia * Natalino }} '''Angelo Moratti''' ([[Somma Lombardo]] 5 November 1909 – [[Viareggio]] 12 August 1981) was an [[Italy|Italian]] [[petroleum|oil]] [[tycoon]]. He was the owner and chairman of the [[Serie A]] [[football (soccer)|football]] club [[Internazionale Milano F.C.|Internazionale]]. He is the father of the former Internazionale's owner and chairman, [[Massimo Moratti]]. {{Authority control}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Moratti, Angelo}} [[Category:1909 births]] [[Category:1981 deaths]] [[Category:Italian businesspeople]] [[Category:Italian football chairmen and investors]] [[Category:Inter Milan chairmen and investors]] {{italy-sport-bio-stub}} {{italy-business-bio-stub}}
